sentences.en: All the royal cars are fitted with electronic homing devices.
sentences.cn: 所有的皇家轿车都装有电子自导引装置。

sentences.en: an electronic organizer (= a small piece of electronic equipment that you can use to record addresses, phone numbers etc )
Cale also uses electronic keyboards to compose.
sentences.cn: 凯尔也用电子键盘谱曲。

sentences.en: Electronic retailing has predictably become known as etailing.
sentences.cn: 正如所料，electronicretailing（网络零售业务）已经被称为etailing。

sentences.en: His desk is covered with electronic gadgetry.
sentences.cn: 他的书桌上摆满了各种电子装置。

sentences.en: Introduction of electronic point-of-sale systems is improving efficiency.
sentences.cn: 引进销售点电子系统提高了效率。

sentences.en: It was a seamless procession of wonderful electronic music.
sentences.cn: 这是一曲优美流畅的电子乐曲。

sentences.en: Once inside they short-circuited the electronic security.
sentences.cn: 一旦置入，它们就会使电子安全设施短路。

sentences.en: Police keep track of the kidnapper using electronic surveillance equipment.
sentences.cn: 警方利用电子监视设备跟踪绑架者。

sentences.en: Semiconductor devices can perform a variety of control functions in electronic equipment.
sentences.cn: 半导体器件在电子设备中能起各式各样的控制作用.

sentences.en: The car has all the latest electronic doodahs.
sentences.cn: 这辆车配有各种最新的电子小玩意儿。

sentences.en: The company invested thousands in an electronic order-control system.
sentences.cn: 公司耗资数千购买了一套电子订单管理系统。

sentences.en: The electronic and printing unit has annual sales of about $80 million.
sentences.cn: 电子印刷部门每年销售额约为8,000万美元。

sentences.en: The identity cards are examined by an electronic scanner.
sentences.cn: 用电子扫描器来检验身份证。

sentences.en: The microscope contains a few hundred dollars-worth of electronic bits and bobs.
sentences.cn: 这架显微镜内有价值数百美元的电子元件。

sentences.en: This dictionary is available in electronic form.

phrases.tran_cn: 电子镇流器；电子安定器
电子设施，电子器件；电子仪表
电子产品；电子设备制造业
使用电脑控制之武器的战争，电子战争

trans.tran_en: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc
